title: 怎么取消掉hat权限
author: qqqqq1097614676
txt_content: 取消hat权限是哪个指令，还有给玩家 随身工作台 随身末影箱 喂饱自己 瞬间回血权限是什么 求大神解答 RPG服务器

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
请输入
/mangaddp builder -essentials.hat
删除hat权限

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
喂饱自己、恢复生命、末影箱子、随身工作台分别输入
/mangaddp builder essentials.food
/mangaddp builder essentials.heal
/mangaddp builder essentials.enderchest
/mangaddp builder essentials.workbench

replies.author: qqqqq1097614676
replies.txt_content:
XJue_DaDa 发表于 2015-9-12 01:02
mangdelp builder -essentials.hat
试过没用。。

replies.author: Red_lg
replies.txt_content:
XJue_DaDa 发表于 2015-9-12 01:02
mangdelp builder -essentials.hat
你这个指令本来就是删除权限的 然后你又加个 - 就变成给权限了= =
